PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2006-16022006-12-15,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
PrecisAppointment of DEPUTY COMMISSIONER BEVERLEY (BEV) A. BUSSON of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be Commissioner of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, to hold office during pleasure until such time as a new Commissioner of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police is appointed, effective December 16, 2006.
